item.description:
con·sil·i·ence n. the linking together and sharing of methods, principles, and knowledges from different disciplines, the process of concurring, literally "to jump together."

Dynamite performers in the house: Gabrilla Ballard, Sergio Reyes, Rafael Medina, Simon Rios, and eRoc of the Foundation Movement.

A gathering of e5 communities with a night of great music, Venezuelan food, and engaging games. The variety of ideas, approaches, histories, and visions that commingle in these halls is astounding, so let's celebrate this consilience together in full spirit!

We will also connect with a communal council in Venezuela, as a portion of the proceeds will go to the purchase of a screen projector in their local community through the efforts of Boston Bolivarianos. Main proceeds go to encuentro 5 to launch its next year.

For tickets and more info, visit: http://www.encuentro5...
item.name: Consilience of e5 Diversity with Live Music, Food, Games
